title: BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Launches LTNCTDs Of Up To 3 Bln Pesos
text:
BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Launches LTNCTDs Of Up To 3 Bln Pesos

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 09:50)

BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Launches LTNCTDs Of Up To 3 Bln Pesos Oct 8 (Reuters) - Bank of the Philippine Islands :

* LAUNCHES LONG-TERM NEGOTIABLE CERTIFICATES OF TIME DEPOSIT

IN

AGGREGATE AMOUNT OF UP TO 3 BILLION PESOS



Source text for Eikon: company coverage: BPI.PS



(Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Launches LTNCTDs Of Up To 3 Bln Pesos
